name: Tile based game
description:
You play as a sorcerer-doctor. Each day, you try to heal all of the patients that arrives in your dispensary. 

Study the Arcanes, open your Spellbook and start your daily shift!

Download an early version of the Tile based game, the new game I'm working on during my free time!

 Mike Azevedo @PKMike
In-game asset by @LucieViatge

Note: When launching the game, please do not move or resize it before the main menu is loaded. The game is designed for 1920*1080 resolutions, for now resizing it will alter the UI.
